front.title: Definitions of Managed Object Extensions for Very High Speed Digital Subscriber Lines (VDSL) Using Single Carrier Modulation (SCM) Line Coding

abstract.t: This document defines a portion of the Management Information Base(MIB) module for use with network management protocols in theInternet community. In particular, it describes objects used for managing the Line Code Specific parameters of Very High Speed Digital Subscriber Line (VDSL) interfaces using Single Carrier Modulation (SCM) Line Coding. It is an optional extension to the VDSL-LINE CORE MIB RFC XXXX [RFCXXXX] which handles the line codeindependent objects.
